input.sentences: my neighbors house caught on fire during the evening .
neighbor boy sadly watching his house burning.i can only imagine how that must feel .
the house had a hard time being put out.it appeared to be spreading to the other houses .
then to our surprise it really did spread.they had to evacuate a couple of my neighbors .
they finally got the fire out and it was just real smoky.filled the neighborhood .
output.sentences: The fire was tragic but it could have been worse.
A neighborhood child watches the fireman who stands on the perimeter of the action.
The other firemen, his colleagues, are at the scene to make sure that there work was complete.
Assured that it is they begin to pack up their equipment.
They are now off to put out another  blaze.
